scripts.glyphhanger: cd public/fonts && glyphhanger http://localhost:4321/articles/ --spider --spider-limit=0 --family='Iansui-Regular' --formats=woff2 --subset=Iansui-Regular.woff2 && glyphhanger http://localhost:4321/ http://localhost:4321/tools --spider --spider-limit=0 --family='GenSenRounded2TW-B' --formats=woff2 --subset=GenSenRounded2TW-B.woff2
